page.title: 13Housing in Felixstowe
page.content: The new houses in Felixstowe are mainly built with red bricks.Nowadays the windows are smaller because it was found that the houses with large windows lost a lot of heat in the winter.New private housing estates are being built on the outskirts of Felixstowe and Trimley St.Mary. The houses,bungalows have 2,3 or 4 bedrooms cost between Â£30,000 and Â£60,000.Council housing is increasing due to expanding population with the dock.Most houses nowadays have central heating fuelled by gas,oil or electricity.To reduce heat loss some windows are either double glazed or secondary glazed.
